website_summaries.verdict: A tried and tested wrinkle-targeting cream from the veteran Japanese line.
pros: This cream’s forte is as an extremely good moisturizer
Works particularly well on combination skin without causing breakouts
Non-greasy product that goes on easily, and a little goes a long way
Results last all day with WrinkleResist24 technology
cons: Expensive, and quite heavily scented, which some did not enjoy

customer_reviews.title: Not Shiseido, or not entirely
customer_reviews.text: The smell is the same, but the consistency and color are quite different from any Shiseido I've purchased in the past. I suspect this is being diluted with some other product. It does not readily absorb into the skin; it sits on top and must be worked in for far longer than an actual Shiseido moisturizer does. Do not buy from this vendor. I will not purchase Shiseido products through Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Shiseido. Used Lancôme and Chanel before it became ...
customer_reviews.text: Love Shiseido. Used Lancôme and Chanel before it became too expensive so decided to try Shiseido. It is really good. We live in southern Florida, sun it HOT and using Shiseido, I have never gotten a tan on my face even though I,walk my puppy 4 times a day and we go bird watching. Keeps my face smooth and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Talia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product. No allergy reaction found like the other brand I used before.
customer_reviews.author: math dummy

customer_reviews.title: Makes me look younger
customer_reviews.text: Shiseido is a wonderful skin care brand. I have used the Benefiance Wrinkle Resist Day creme for years and receive compliments on my skin. It takes very little to go a long way. I stopped using it for awhile (did not want to spend the money) but have found this was not a good thing to do, I will not run out again.
customer_reviews.author: KYLE CHAPMAN

customer_reviews.title: My mom is such a complicated person to buy for ...
customer_reviews.text: My mom is such a complicated person to buy for, but you can never go wrong with Shseido!!!! Even i sneak some when she isn't looking.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey J Angel

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my mom and she loved it. She always keeps telling me to buy skin care for her since I was successful with this purchase 😄
customer_reviews.author: Elmir Misirzada

customer_reviews.title: I got my order today, but to my surprise ...
customer_reviews.text: I got my order today, but to my surprise the box was broken and open on the side and with a non original tape on the box. The security sticker was also open and put back together
customer_reviews.author: Liliane Remorini

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product because of Shiseido eye cream is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because of Shiseido eye cream is a 4/5 star. It to me this cream is just average. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: smj

customer_reviews.title: jury out on how well it works but love Shiseido products
customer_reviews.text: Still using; jury out on how well it works but love Shiseido products.
customer_reviews.author: eew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this, use it everyday. Love the feel. It is very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great scent for the face...
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent. Its a smooth cream. I will purchase it again
customer_reviews.author: graciela

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisture, it help my skin to look glow and young. Especially when you getting old this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: GenHunt

customer_reviews.title: Good cream
customer_reviews.text: Fine! My wife really liked this cream, but you should not use it for the area under the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Ilya Burtnik

customer_reviews.title: It is an excellent moisturizer for my combination aging skin Also
customer_reviews.text: As always, Shiseido Beneficence brand delivers what it promises. It is an excellent moisturizer for my combination aging skin Also, It is light and rich at the same time and has a very pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: big spender

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Order for my mom and she’s loves it good price!
customer_reviews.author: kia

customer_reviews.title: Well Done.
customer_reviews.text: Product quality, condition and delivery was as advertised. Very efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Has a bit of a "more mature lady" smell but it doesnt linger. Very smooth and moisturizes nicely. My face is very sensitive but no breakouts!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Best Day Cream for us older folks
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for several years. It is the only product that protects my 60ish skin. I've tried other major brands, but none of them do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Zephyr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cream
customer_reviews.text: This cream is perfect for my skin. No greasy feeling and I don't need any makeup on it..
customer_reviews.author: LoveReading

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this purchase! Great deal! Will definitely buy again! Thank you so much ☺️
customer_reviews.author: kacey

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This a gift for my mom's friends. They like it and had ordered another one themselves. It looks good for me though. But I didn't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Qianying Chen

customer_reviews.title: It was okay not any difference then all the other ...
customer_reviews.text: It was okay not any difference then all the other money I spent of others saying it would help the same way. Feels greasy at firs. I will spend the money on my other stuff as Mary Kay worked just as well.
customer_reviews.author: jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Shiseido makes good products with reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very smooth cream and I use each day. Price is right and hope it helps skin. K.L. Greiner
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Greiner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, baby soft skin in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: My whole family swears by this product and now I see why. I started looking into face creams about a year ago when I started seeing my skin was very dry and I could see I had laugh lines and noticeable lines around my eyes. So my mom suggested I purchase a quality face cream. After 2 weeks of using this I felt like I had brand new skin. Now I've been using this for about 6 months and my skin looks plump and supple. My lines have reduced tremendously and I feel like myself again. I would recommend this cream to anyone. As well as Shiseido's eye cream. Amazing, will definitely keep purchasing for years to come
customer_reviews.author: LCTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Empty product package arrived with no product inside! Can't even make returns.
customer_reviews.text: Product theft. External mailing box is untampered. But there's no glass cream bottle inside of the shisheido box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I use Shiseiido products exclusively, and they are the best skin products I have ever used. I receive many compliments on my complexion, and they are age-defying and have sunscreen protection.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine L. Hurston

customer_reviews.title: Very rich moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Rich and dense. Very moisturizing- much richer than the nighttime moisture. I often use it at night, too.
customer_reviews.author: NYCYa

customer_reviews.text: Have used for over 30 years and their products work well.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this lotion for a ling timr. I ordered here because it was significantly cheaper than any other place. I was afraid it won’t be original but it was all good!
customer_reviews.author: br

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm not expecting that the size is big.I think it's cheap for its price. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: thess

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes You Don't Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: I prefer neutrogena 100; less costly, very moisturizing and a very good sun block.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra B. Nicol

customer_reviews.title: As good as ever!
customer_reviews.text: Authentic! If you know that Shiseido works for your skin type, stick with it. As good as it was many years ago.
customer_reviews.author: E K

customer_reviews.title: Very fast sipping and excellent product. Arrived sealed in original packaging
customer_reviews.text: Very fast sipping and excellent product. Arrived sealed in original packaging. This is very good cream and a little goes a very long way
customer_reviews.author: Luca

customer_reviews.title: No difference
customer_reviews.text: Didn't see a difference under the eyes like some other reviews state.
customer_reviews.author: Ryno

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived on time and this seller is awesome. I would buy it again later
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and this seller is awesome. I would buy it again later. I also love this product; )
customer_reviews.author: Tezzie92111

customer_reviews.title: But the inside was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The box was crushed and there were white tapes sealing it. But the inside was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the cream, my face feels smooth, I'm very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermina Meza

customer_reviews.title: It's the best!
customer_reviews.text: Sheseido is the only skin care I have used for 15 years! It's the best!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Maxson

customer_reviews.title: I like
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and works pretty well. Id like a little thicker day cream for moisture purposes, but overall it feels good on my skin and is not oily at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: It is a little greasy but not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time. I've been using this for few years now and loves the feel it gives, skin soft after use. It is a little greasy but not bad at all. I use it before applying my foundation. It keeps your skin soft and moisturized. Hope that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Souvan

customer_reviews.title: radiant skin
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sister who has super sensitive/oily skin. She likes how it leaves her skin feeling soft/smooth without the "oily" and weird dryness sensation on her skin. The scent wasn't overpowering; it had a nice light rosy smell. My sister uses this product before she applied her makeup on and before she goes to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: This feels just like the all the others
customer_reviews.text: Been using this face cream for years. This feels just like the all the others. Definitely authentic!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this face cream. So much better than the other one I was using.
customer_reviews.author: Dela

customer_reviews.title: I love the texture
customer_reviews.text: I love the texture. It is very thick and creamy. I believe it is really helping moisturize my face during these cold, dry, winter months.
customer_reviews.author: TW

product_meta.title: Shiseido SPF 18 Benefiance Wrinkle-Resist 24 Day Cream for Unisex, 1.8 Ounce
product_meta.description: Benefiance WrinkleResist24 Day Cream SPF 18 was launched by the design house of Shiseido
feature_bullets: A high performance anti aging daytime moisturizer
Contains wild thyme extract to shield skin against breakdown of DNA caused by UV rays
Preserves rich moisture in skin under even dry conditions throughout the day
